name: Bronze Golem
description: The Bronze Golem is a massive construct made of bronze, representing the blend of arcane magic and metalwork. Its body is hot to the touch, featuring an internal boiler.
memorable: Its Brazen Bull ability traps enemies in its body, causing severe fire damage and blindness.
goals: To serve as a guardian or weapon for its creator.
relations: May serve powerful creators or be found alongside other constructs.
environment: Often found in magical workshops or ruins where it was created.
strengths: Immune to many conditions, highly resistant to non-magical physical damage, and has powerful melee attacks.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity and Intelligence make it slow and unwise in combat.
attacks: Can perform two powerful slam attacks and grapple opponents, and has a dangerous ability to force grappling foes into its boiler.
most_powerful_ability: Brazen Bull, allowing it to trap and severely harm grappling targets.
senses: Has a passive perception of 14, enhancing its ability to notice hidden creatures.
skills: Possesses a perception skill with a +4 modifier.
additional_information: Immune to poison and psychic damage.
Grapples opponents and can only hold one at a time in its boiler.
All weapon attacks are considered magical.
Magic Resistance gives it an advantage against spells.
test_queries: massive bronze construct with fire abilities
golem that traps enemies in its boiler
highly resistant guardian made of bronze
magical guardian with boiling body feature
large construct immune to many conditions
